#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define rep(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define ren(i,n) for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
#define forp(i,a,b) for(long i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define forn(i,a,b) for(long i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define pll pair<long long int,long long int>
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define vll vector<long long int>  
#define vii vector<int>
#define gi(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define gll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define gstr(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define gl(n) cin >> n
#define gli(m,n) cin >> m >> n
#define oi(n) printf("%d",n)
#define oll(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define ostr(n) printf("%s",n)
#define ol(n) cout << n
#define os cout<<" "
#define on cout<<"\n"
#define o2(a,b) cout<<a<<" "<<b
#define all(n,cmp) n.begin(),n.end()
#define alll(n,i,j) n.begin()+i,n.begin()+j
#define present(s,x) (s.find(x) != s.end()) 
#define cpresent(s,x) (find(all(s),x) != s.end())
#define mem(n) memset(n,0,sizeof(n))
#define boost ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false)
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;
 
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
typedef long long int ll;
typedef long int lg;
typedef vector<vector<ll> > mat;
lg bin_pow(long a,long n,long m) {
  long res = 1;
  while(n){
      if(res&1) res = (res*a)%m;
  	a = (a*a)%m;
    n >>= 1;
  }
 return res;
}
int dp[20010][505];
int main()
{
  boost;
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  char s[20010];
  lg q,m,l,n,i,j,cnt,prev,curr;
  gli(s,q);
  n = strlen(s);
  while(q--) {
  	gli(m,l);
	cnt = 0;
    prev = 0;
    curr = 1;
    mem(dp);
    dp[prev][(s[0]-'0')%m]++;
    cnt+= dp[prev][l];
    forp(i,1,n-1)
    {
      //mem(dp[i]);
      dp[curr][(s[i]-'0')%m]++;
      rep(j,m)
       {
         if(dp[prev][j]) 
           dp[curr][((j*10)+s[i]-'0')%m] += dp[prev][j];
       }
     cnt += dp[curr][l];
     prev = curr;
     curr++;
    }
  ol(cnt),on;
}
return 0;
}
